case_body_condition: Not recognizable - Near complete or complete skeleton
case_circumstances: The decedent was found in a very remote landfill area, in a ravine near the corner of Hollywood and Vegas Drive, behind Las Vegas High School.  The remains were partially skeletonized.
fingerprints: Fingerprint information is currently not available
case_clothing_on_body: Hanes white T-shirt (size 42-44), blue pants (40 x 30), blue underwear, white socks, black belt
case_clothing_with_body: Army jacket (M) with staff seargent insignia patch on collar points and a parachutist insignia on the breast pocket.  Airborne patch sewn on the shoulder and a knife patch on the upper arm
case_jewelry: White metal bars with balls to both eyebrows and lower lip; Necklace of round beads (3/8", possible wood) bearing black Chinese/Japanese characters
dental: Dental information / charting is available and entered
documents: There are currently no documents available for this case.
